subject: Missing parts
description_text:
ï»¿Hello i just received my order but i am missing the control box. I received the two motors and a power supply. No control box. This is a big bummer is there anyway one can  be rush shipped?? This is my order below. 




Sent from Mike's iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Mike Kane,    We sincerely apologise for the inconvenience and have arranged an urgent replacement for you.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045893110466
